Only three episodes so far.
And the current cartoon is actually taking some scenes from the original Ninja Turtles live-action movie. [spoiler]Season 3 opens with the Turtles, April, and Casey hiding out in April's old farhouse mourning the loss of Master Splinter. Complete with April writing in a diary and providing some brief narration. The only difference Leo is the one who's beat to shit and not Raph.[/spoiler]
